name: Antelink
overview:
Antelink xxx is a software vendor specialized in Software Life Cycle Management and Open Source Component detection. Start-up from INRIA, winner of the OSEO 2009 creation and development prize and supported by CDC Entreprise, Antelink supplies the world largest knowledge base of open source components (www.antepedia.com).

Antelink promotes 3 solutions that enable customers to reduce software development cost, ensure the company’s policy, limit the legal risks linked to the use of open source components, and secure their applications :

Antepedia Notifier is the first solution for open source continuous detection. By plugging it into your SCM repository (Git, Subversion, or Mercurial), every time a developer commits an open source file, Antepedia Notifier will notify you by e-mail or by creating an issue in your JIRA instance. It checks every source file, resource, and component of your source code, commit after commit. Thanks to it, open source reuse is faster and more cost-effective, your open source management workflow is optimized, and your license compliance rules are enforced.

Antepedia Developer is for now on an Eclipse plugin that enables developers to detect open source files while they code. It is completely integrated into the Eclipse user interface and is compatible with any file, regardless of its type or programming language. Antepedia Developer for Eclipse helps you to integrate open source detection early in your development process, reduce the costs associated with the correction of license compliance issues, improve collaboration between developers, project managers, and the legal department of your organization.

Antepedia Reporter allows project managers or legal advisors to create reports about the open source components in your code base or file system. It provides an intuitive and user friendly interface, which eases the detection, the analysis, and the audit of open source files. With Antepedia Reporter, open source reuse is faster and more cost-effective, your open source management workflow is optimized, and your license compliance rules are enforced.
